Title: Structure
Definition: Costs associated with the repair or replacement (reconstruction) of a physical structure such as a building or piece of infrastructure that sustain damage.

Title: Content
Definition: Costs associated with the repair or replacement of the physical contents of a structure that sustain damage.

Title: Product
Definition: Costs associated with the loss of products produced by businesses, which may or may not be physical items.

Title: Disruption (Business Interruption)
Definition: Costs associated with disruption to the planned operations or service provision of a business or infrastructure.
